channel.title: CVE Feed for SAP SE -- SAP Landscape Management
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SAP SE -- SAP Landscape Management

item.title: CVE-2020-6191|2024-08-04T08:55:22.096Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20landscape%20management
item.description: SAP Landscape Management, version 3.0, allows an attacker with admin privileges to execute malicious executables with root privileges in SAP Host Agent via SAP Landscape Management due to Missing Input Validation.

item.title: CVE-2020-6192|2024-08-04T08:55:22.058Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20landscape%20management
item.description: SAP Landscape Management, version 3.0, allows an attacker with admin privileges to execute malicious commands with root privileges in SAP Host Agent via SAP Landscape Management.

item.title: CVE-2020-6236|2024-08-04T08:55:22.273Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20landscape%20management
item.description: SAP Landscape Management, version 3.0, and SAP Adaptive Extensions, version 1.0, allows an attacker with admin_group privileges to change ownership and permissions (including S-user ID bit s-bit) of arbitrary files remotely. This results in the possibility to execute these files as root user from a non-root context, leading to Privilege Escalation.
